thread.title: Mr. Trump forms a presidential image
thread.title_full: Mr. Trump forms a presidential image - The Washington Post

author: washingtonpost.com
title: Mr. Trump forms a presidential image
text:
Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump talks about his tax plan during a news conference Sept. 28 in New York. (Julie Jacobson/Associated Press) October 1 at 5:07 PM Donald Trump gave the best speech of his political career this week [“ A lot for conservatives to like in Trump tax plan ,” news, Sept. 29]. It was very strong and full of ideas and facts. He didn’t beat around the bush (no pun intended). His speech discussed how a Trump administration would fix the economy, reduce tax rates and decrease unemployment.
I found nothing but truth in what Mr. Trump said. He looked the part, spoke the part and acted the part of a president. If Mr. Trump continues to look like a president and act like a president, then he probably will become the president. Presenting the image is just as important as presenting the man.
John Lemandri , Williamsburg, Va.
